cz.muni.fi.pb138.scxml2svg

Class XmlTransformator

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.muni.fi.pb138.scxml2svg.XmlTransformator

  • public class XmlTransformator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class, that can apply an XSLT transform to Xml files.

    • Method Detail

      • transform

        public void transform(java.io.File sourceFile,
             java.io.File templateFile,
             java.io.File destFile)
               throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException,
                      javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        Transforms given Xml file using given XSLT template, saving its result to destination file.
        Parameters:
        sourceFile - file to be transformed
        templateFile - template of XSLT transform
        destFile - file to save the result of the transform
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there is a problem with opening any of files.
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException - Thrown if there are errors when parsing the Source or it is not possible to create a Transformer instance.
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - If an unrecoverable error occurs during the course of the transformation.

      • transform

        public void transform(java.io.InputStream sourceStream,
             java.io.InputStream templateStream,
             java.io.OutputStream destStream)
               throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException,
                      javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        Transforms given Xml file using given XSLT template, saving its result to destination file.
        Parameters:
        sourceStream - stream from file to be transformed
        templateStream - template of XSLT transform
        destStream - stream to save the result of the transform
        Throws:
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException - Thrown if there are errors when parsing the Source or it is not possible to create a Transformer instance.
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - If an unrecoverable error occurs during the course of the transformation.
